main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Long Beach, California, on April 6, 1958, with specifics indicating it resembled a half-gallon jar and was bright red in color.
interesting points: The object was observed for 5-10 minutes., Two bright red objects were seen side by side., One smaller ship was observed alongside the larger ones., Three additional objects varied in size and brightness., The sighting occurred under clear skies with no clouds.
sighted object: half gallon jar shaped, bright red objects
witness description: G. Huffiepe and Bucke, both 22 years old, one being a fire tender.
